top_comments_top.body:
Most games allow you to change region freely (except LoL).

As long as one of you have a fairly good connection there shouldn't be too much of a problem. Just set the region to whoever has the weakest connection.
I think games with online coop would be fine. Have you tried Civ 6?
The new Mario party for Switch has online multiplayer. Just have a discord call running on your phones to yell and make fun of each other. Good times!

Also, get a VPN

Like Nord VPN or Private Internet Access.

You can set your region to that of you BF and you can play everything together. 

Ping might be a problem tho
